slides.title: UrbanNest QR Code Launch Campaign
slides.subtitle: Driving First-Time Buyers in Tier-2 Markets
leftColumn: Primary Focus: WhatsApp and QR Promotions

rightBlock.paragraph: The QR Code launch campaign aimed at increasing first-time buyers in Tier-2 cities through WhatsApp promotions and mobile-optimized QR experiences. This deck captures all key stages, results, learnings, and recommendations.

The campaign exceeded ROI expectations significantly while acquiring new customers primarily through WhatsApp and retargeted offers, demonstrating the viability of QR-first promotions in emerging urban markets.

slides.title: Research & Planning Insights
leftColumn: Tier-2 audiences showed high QR responsiveness
Competitor campaigns focused heavily on flat discounts
₹500 OFF crafted exclusively for first 500 customers

rightBlock.paragraph: Market research showed a gap in QR-activated mobile promotions. UrbanNest uniquely targeted mobile-first buying behavior with WhatsApp and influencer support to distinguish its offer.
A strong content calendar was executed with teaser WhatsApp campaigns, influencer collaborations, and operational readiness for WhatsApp QR flows to ensure a smooth launch.

slides.title: Customer Feedback Trends
leftColumn: Minor friction with manual coupon application

slides.title: Operational Learnings
leftColumn: Minor delays observed in Tier-2 deliveries

rightBlock.paragraph: Operationally, the chatbot-driven engagement handled majority queries autonomously, while minor SLA issues were flagged for deliveries in some Tier-2 locations.
The QR-first strategy on WhatsApp outperformed traditional approaches. Manual coupon redemption steps need streamlining. Carousel ads yielded lower click-through than Story ads.

slides.title: Future Recommendations
leftColumn: Expand use of Story Ads on Facebook/Instagram
Gamify QR journey for higher engagement

rightBlock.paragraph: Future campaigns should prioritize seamless discount application, Story-led creatives for better engagement, and invest further in gamified mobile-first interactions for faster user conversion.
The campaign's success was a collaborative achievement across marketing, tech, sales, influencer partners, and support teams. UrbanNest now stands stronger with deeper Tier-2 market penetration.
